description:
2-bedroom apartment in the heart of the LES. Tons of bars and restaurants nearby, and a 5-minute walk to the FM and JZ trains. Very quiet apartment (no street noise at all!). There's a wine fridge to chill all your wine, and a washer dryer if you're staying a while. 

There are 2 private bedrooms with full-size beds, and a full-size futon in the living room.
name: Entire 2BR LES Apartment
